messages.content:
I have a table describing essential oils and perfumes, can you fill in all the gaps using your best understanding of what should go in there for each element? 
Oil Name	Properties	Fragrance Notes	Note (base/mid/high)
Bakul Attar	Creamy, Fragrant, Emotional Uplift, Promotes Positivity	Floral - Sweet Floral	
Cambodian Oud	Rich, Earthy, Encourages Mindfulness, Promotes Relaxation	Woody - Mossy/Earthy	base
Fougere	Stimulating, Sweet, Enhances Alertness, Promotes Positivity	Green - Fresh Cut Grass	
Cedar Leaf	Calming, Grounding, Encourages Strength, Boosts Self-Esteem	Woody - Coniferous	
Frangipani	Confidence Booster, Aids Concentration, Emotional Balance	Floral - Tropical	
Lebanese Orange Blossom Oil	Uplifting, Revitalizing, Promotes Joy, Enhances Creativity	Floral - Citrus	high
Petrichor	Grounding, Calming, Rejuvenating, Promotes Tranquility	Earthy - Mineralic	base
Pink Lotus	Sensuous, Stimulating, Emotional Uplift, Enhances Sensuality	Floral - Subtropical	mid
Vetiver Absolute			base
Patchouli 			
Sandalwood Saffron Attar			
Moroccan Rose Oil			
Lavender			high
Jasmine			
Eucalyptus			
Vanilla			
Mint			
Sandalwood			
Frankincense			
Sweet Orange			
Ylang			
Lemon			
Rose			
Bergamot			
Tea Tree			
Citronella			
Patchouli			
Rosemary			
Geranium			
Lemongrass			
Chamomile			
Juniper Berry			
Basil			
Cedar			
Sage			
Vetiver			
Grapefruit			
Cypress			
Tangerine			
Myrrh			
Oregano			
Neroli			
Helichrysum			
Copaiba			
Lemon Eucalyptus			
Turmeric			
Spearmint			
Mimosa			

I'd like a markup table back

Certainly! Below is the table with the gaps filled in based on my understanding of each essential oil or perfume.

| Oil Name                   | Properties                                          | Fragrance Notes            | Note (base/mid/high) |
|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|----------------------------|----------------------|
| Bakul Attar                | Creamy, Fragrant, Emotional Uplift, Promotes Positivity | Floral - Sweet Floral      | mid                  |
| Cambodian Oud              | Rich, Earthy, Encourages Mindfulness, Promotes Relaxation | Woody - Mossy/Earthy       | base                 |
| Fougere                    | Stimulating, Sweet, Enhances Alertness, Promotes Positivity | Green - Fresh Cut Grass    | mid                  |
| Cedar Leaf                 | Calming, Grounding, Encourages Strength, Boosts Self-Esteem | Woody - Coniferous         | base                 |
| Frangipani                 | Confidence Booster, Aids Concentration, Emotional Balance | Floral - Tropical          | mid                  |
| Lebanese Orange Blossom Oil| Uplifting, Revitalizing, Promotes Joy, Enhances Creativity | Floral - Citrus            | high                 |
| Petrichor                  | Grounding, Calming, Rejuvenating, Promotes Tranquility | Earthy - Mineralic         | base                 |
| Pink Lotus                 | Sensuous, Stimulating, Emotional Uplift, Enhances Sensuality | Floral - Subtropical        | mid                  |
| Vetiver Absolute           | Grounding, Calming, Balancing                        | Woody - Earthy/Smoky       | base                 |
| Patchouli                  | Earthy, Grounding, Balancing, Calming                | Earthy - Musky             | base                 |
| Sandalwood Saffron Attar   | Rich, Warm, Grounding, Balancing                     | Woody - Spicy              | base                 |
| Moroccan Rose Oil          | Uplifting, Emotional Balance, Promotes Positivity    | Floral - Sweet/Rich        | mid                  |
| Lavender                   | Calming, Relaxing, Soothing, Balancing               | Floral - Herbal            | mid                  |
| Jasmine                    | Uplifting, Confidence Booster, Promotes Positivity   | Floral - Sweet/Exotic      | mid                  |
| Eucalyptus                 | Invigorating, Clearing, Purifying                    | Herbal - Camphoraceous     | mid                  |
| Vanilla                    | Warm, Comforting, Relaxing                           | Sweet - Creamy             | base                 |
| Mint                       | Refreshing, Uplifting, Clearing                      | Herbal - Fresh             | high                 |
| Sandalwood                 | Grounding, Calming, Balancing                        | Woody - Rich               | base                 |
| Frankincense               | Calming, Grounding, Spiritual                        | Resinous - Balsamic        | base                 |
| Sweet Orange               | Uplifting, Refreshing, Promotes Positivity            | Citrus - Sweet             | mid                  |
| Ylang Ylang                | Uplifting, Relaxing, Sensual                         | Floral - Sweet/Exotic      | base                 |
| Lemon                      | Uplifting, Refreshing, Purifying                     | Citrus - Zesty/Tart        | high                 |
| Rose                       | Uplifting, Emotional Balance, Promotes Positivity    | Floral - Sweet/Rich        | mid                  |
| Bergamot                   | Uplifting, Calming, Refreshing                       | Citrus - Sweet/Spicy       | high                 |
| Tea Tree                   | Invigorating, Cleansing, Purifying                   | Herbal - Medicinal         | mid

| Citronella                 | Refreshing, Invigorating, Insect-Repellent           | Citrus - Lemony            | top                  |
| Patchouli                  | Earthy, Grounding, Balancing, Calming                | Earthy - Musky             | base                 |
| Rosemary                   | Refreshing, Invigorating, Clarifying                 | Herbal - Woody/Camphor     | mid                  |
| Geranium                   | Balancing, Uplifting, Promotes Positivity            | Floral - Rose-like         | mid                  |
| Lemongrass                 | Refreshing, Invigorating, Purifying                  | Citrus - Lemon/Grassy      | top                  |
| Chamomile                  | Calming, Soothing, Relaxing                          | Herbal - Sweet/Appley      | mid                  |
| Juniper Berry              | Purifying, Grounding, Calming                        | Woody - Fresh/Balsamic     | mid                  |
| Basil                      | Uplifting, Refreshing, Clarifying                    | Herbal - Sweet/Spicy       | top                  |
| Cedar                      | Grounding, Confidence Booster, Calming               | Woody - Warm               | base                 |
| Sage                       | Purifying, Balancing, Calming                        | Herbal - Camphoraceous     | mid                  |
| Vetiver                    | Grounding, Calming, Balancing                        | Woody - Earthy/Smoky       | base                 |
| Grapefruit                 | Uplifting, Refreshing, Invigorating                  | Citrus - Sweet/Tart        | top                  |
| Cypress                    | Grounding, Balancing, Calming                        | Woody - Fresh              | mid                  |
| Tangerine                  | Uplifting, Refreshing, Calming                        | Citrus - Sweet             | top                  |
| Myrrh                      | Grounding, Spiritual, Calming                        | Resinous - Warm/Balsamic   | base                 |
| Oregano                    | Purifying, Protective, Immune Support                | Herbal - Warm/Spicy        | mid                  |
| Neroli                     | Uplifting, Calming, Promotes Positivity              | Floral - Sweet/Citrusy     | mid                  |
| Helichrysum                | Healing, Regenerative, Protective                    | Herbal - Warm/Honey-like   | base                 |
| Copaiba                    | Calming, Grounding, Anti-inflammatory                | Woody - Sweet/Balsamic     | base                 |
| Lemon Eucalyptus           | Refreshing, Invigorating, Insect-Repellent           | Citrus - Lemony/Camphor    | top                  |
| Turmeric                   | Anti-inflammatory, Healing, Grounding                | Spicy - Warm/Earthy        | base                 |
| Spearmint                  | Refreshing, Uplifting, Digestive Support             | Herbal - Sweet/Minty       | top                  |
| Mimosa                     | Uplifting, Calming, Relaxing                         | Floral - Sweet/Powdery     | mid                  |

Please note that these properties and fragrance notes are based on general knowledge and may vary depending on the source or brand of the essential oil or perfume. The categorization into base, mid, or high notes is also approximate and can sometimes be subjective.
